page.title: 15Games at School and Home 2
page.content:
Other outside games indude french cricket, bat and ball, running games, war, police, acton-man, cars, and soldiers.
We looked at games played in school. The games that children liked best were football, chainy and british bulldog, and games children did not like were road-runner, skipping and hopscotch.
In school children played games before school started in the morning, during a fifteen minute break in the morning and for about forty-five minutes at lunchtime. In poor weather outside games are restricted to the playground, but in summer most children chose to play on the school field.
